item.title: Paramount Skydance to cut 1,000 jobs
item.description: Paramount Skydance will begin a major round of layoffs with about 1,000 job cuts on Wednesday, a source familiar with the matter said on Monday. The job cuts, which follow the $8.4 billion merger between Skydance Media and Paramount Global, would impact roughly 5.0 per cent of Paramount's employee

item.title: Rain likely over Khulna, Barishal, Chattogram
item.description: The Bangladesh Meteorological Department (BMD) forecast rain or thundershowers at a few places over Khulna, Barishal and Chattogram divisions for the next 24 hours, beginning at 9:00 am today. "Rain or thundershowers is likely to occur at a few places over Khulna, Barishal and Chattogram divisions

item.title: Chattogram Port disposes of long-stored hazardous goods in two-day operation
item.description: In a move to ensure port safety and environmental protection, a total of 19 containers of Dangerous Goods (DG) that had been lying unattended for years at Chattogram Port were safely destroyed over the weekend under strict supervision and environmental compliance. The destruction process, conducte

item.title: CA receives recommendations from Consensus Commission
item.description: The National Consensus Commission has handed over its recommendations on the implementation of the July National Charter to Muhammad Yunus, chief advisor to the interim government. The incident occurred after 1 pm on Tuesday at the chief advisor’s official residence, the State Guest House Ja

item.title: CRAB holds 105th board meeting
item.description: The Credit Rating Agency of Bangladesh Ltd. (CRAB) held its 105th Board Meeting on October 27, 2025, at Square Center, Mohakhali. The meeting was chaired by CRAB Chairman Noor A. Alam Chowdhury, according to a press release. Among those present were board directors Tapan Chowdhury, Asif Saad Bin

item.title: BUET admission applications open from Nov 16; exams start from Jan 10
item.description: Applications for the admission tests at the Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology (BUET) will begin on November 16, with exams scheduled to start on January 10. The Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology on Monday published the admission circular for the 2025–26 ac

item.title: ULAB hosted it’s 8th Convocation Ceremony
item.description: The University of Liberal Arts Bangladesh (ULAB) held its 8th Convocation on Tuesday at the Bangladesh-China Friendship Conference Centre, delving into the theme "Informed Minds, Inspire Paths”.
